DOC.brief_summary: To determine the optimal dose of DMP 115 to image liver lesions and to assess whether contrast can improve the detection of focal liver lesions.
DOC.brief_title: A Phase II Study of DMP 115 to Assess Focal Liver Lesions
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with 1 but <7 focal liver lesions Scheduled for liver biopsy within 30 days of study Scheduled for CT or MR within 30 days of study Critically ill subjects Subjects with righttoleft shunts
